thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 27 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-India's RBL Bank March Qtr PAT Up 37 Pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's RBL Bank March Qtr PAT Up 37 Pct
text:
April 27 (Reuters) - RBL Bank Ltd:
* MARCH QUARTER PAT 1.78 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS PROFIT OF 1.30 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* MARCH QUARTER INTEREST EARNED 12.23 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 9.86 BILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* MARCH QUARTER PROVISIONS AND CONTINGENCIES 1.13 BILLION RUPEES VERSUS 821 MILLION RUPEES LAST YEAR
* MARCH QUARTER GROSS NPA 1.40 PERCENT VERSUS 1.56 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* MARCH QUARTER NET NPA 0.78 PERCENT VERSUS 0.97 PERCENT PREVIOUS QUARTER
* RECOMMENDED DIVIDEND OF 2.10 RUPEES PER SHARE * MARCH QUARTER NET INTEREST MARGIN 3.98 PERCENT Source text - bit.ly/2vP8EKO Further company coverage:
